EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2017.Training open-New sessions 7-11-17
EmailTemplate.subject: SpringOne Platform Training Announced and New Speakers Added
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> planning is in full swing, training registration is now open, and we’re adding new speakers to the schedule <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> every day, including recently added talks featuring:
- Neville George, Cloud Engineer, Comcast - Anton Ovechkin, Principal Software Engineering Lead, Microsoft - Michael Barber, SVP, Customer System & Technologies, Synchrony Financial - Brendan Aye, Principal Cloud Foundry Platform Architect, T-Mobile - Vaughn Vernon, Author, Implementing Domain-Driven Design
You can find a list of all sessions confirmed to date here <[[https://springoneplatform.io/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]>.
SpringOne Platform Training Registration is Open If last year is any indication, our training will sell out quickly so be sure to register <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> today and save your seat.
These classes provide you and your team an opportunity to receive in-depth, lab-based training across some of the latest Pivotal technologies. Best of all, pre-conference classes cost a fraction of the price compared to traditional instructor-led training and takes place two-days before the main conference.
Check out the class curriculum and register <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> today for discounted pricing!
- Pivotal Cloud Foundry <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training/pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> - Spring Cloud Services <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training/spring-cloud-services?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> - Spring Boot Developer <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training/spring-boot-developer?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> - Spring Cloud Data Flow <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training/spring-cloud-data-flow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> - What’s New in Spring 5 <[[https://springoneplatform.io/training/new-in-spring-5?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]>
SpringOne Platform 2017 <[[https://2017.springoneplatform.io/ehome/s1p/registration?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]> will take place December 4-7 in San Francisco, and is the premier conference for those who build, deploy, and run cloud-native software. This unique four-day event brings together leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software.
We hope to see you there,
The SpringOne Platform Team
© 2017 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences.
